mapper.select:
select li.id, li.audit_title, li.days, li.status, li.create_date, li.images, li.teacher_id, li.audit_date, ti.code as teacherCode, ti.name as teacherName, ti.images as teacherImages, ti.phone from leave_teacher_info li left join teacher_info ti on (ti.id = li.teacher_id) where 1 = 1
AND li.status = #{leaveTeacherInfo.status}
AND ti.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{leaveTeacherInfo.teacherName},'%')
order by li.create_date desc
